name: Scrum Master of the Universe
description:
Scrum Master of the Universe

Get it done! A comedy game for agile teams.

Get the rights scrum team member to remove the impediments and move cards to "done".

Each team member is able to act on a specific work:


Be careful not to let your aging get too high. Cards have SLAs, and once they expire, your game is over.

Oh! And try not to get your PO do to technical work. They'll make a mess of it.

Controls MoveA/SShoot dev
X/C
